Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechancial problem on the train at Oak Park. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechancial problem on the train at Oak Park. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute at King Drive/69th
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 69th, Anthony, King Drive due to, street blockage near King Drive/69th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 69th, Anthony, King Drive due to, street blockage near King Drive/69th.

Allow extra travel time.
